data.event: Long Beach was founded in the 1920s as a resort town.

event.title: is located at 41°44′44″N 86°51′5″W. According to the 2010

data.event: Long Beach is located at 41°44′44″N 86°51′5″W. According to the 2010 census, Long Beach has a total area of 3.15 square miles (8.16 km2), of which 1.06 square miles (2.75 km2) (or 33.65%) is land and 2.09 square miles (5.41 km2) (or 66.35%) is water.
